title: Borders
body: Hello, last season I was in gold V, and then i didn't play for a while. But then now when i started i didnt have a gold border, and I was gold in season 6 and now it's season 7. Please help!

replies.body:
Did you **end the season** in Gold, or did you simply hit Gold sometime during the season? The ranked borders are for what you ended the season in, although there are a few things that could have disqualified you, as *Lew* mentioned, which I've listed below:

>* **Players with bans or chat restrictions active when the season ends are ineligible for this year’s rewards.**
* **Players issued a ban of seven days or more in the three months prior to the end of the season (from August 7 on) are ineligible for this year’s rewards.**
* **Players banned for boosting during the 2016 season remain ineligible for rewards.**

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
My friend played on my account and got me a chat ban, will i get the rewards later or never?

Regardless of who incurred the ban, if the ban occurred within the boundaries listed above, the account would be ineligible for end-of-season rewards.

If you have any other questions about this, I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Ok thank you for the help, btwhe played on my pc xD when he was at my house..
Shouldn't admit to that, think having others play on your account is considered punishable.

There are a few [reasons ](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon)that an account could be disqualified from getting ranked rewards.  If that doesn't fit your situation, I suggest writing in a support ticket.
